Summarise school-level data extracted from Wonde API

Source: R/school_summary.R
summarise_school_data.Rd

Processes a list of Wonde school extracts and produces a summary table showing year group availability, subject detection, student counts, and data part coverage for each school. Designed to work with data returned by get_secondary_school_student_data().

Usage

summarise_school_data(
  schools,
  WondeData,
  year_codes_target = c("7", "Year 7", "07", "Year 07", "Y7", "Yr7", "Yr 7"),
  subject_keywords = c("Maths", "Mathematics", "Ma", "Mathematic",
    "Mathematics (Assessment+)")
)

Arguments

schools

Data frame containing school metadata (must include at least URN, id, and name columns).

WondeData

Named list of school data extracts (as returned from get_secondary_school_student_data()).

year_codes_target

Character vector of year codes used to identify the target year group (default includes multiple Year 7 code variations).

subject_keywords

Character vector of subject name patterns to identify relevant subjects (default identifies Maths-related names).

Value

A data frame containing school-level summaries including:

  • year_code_values: available year codes in the extract

  • HasTargetYear: whether the target year group is present

  • target_year_subjects: subjects available for the target year

  • GetSubjectByCode: detection of target subject by subject code

  • class_desc_target_year: available class descriptions for the target year

  • GetSubjectByClassDescription: detection of subject by class description

  • total_students: total number of students in the school

  • total_target_year_students: total number of students in the target year group

  • Logical indicators for which data parts were successfully extracted (e.g. student, subjects, staff, etc.)

Details

The function checks the structure of each school's data extract, detects the presence of the user-specified year group and subjects, and identifies whether relevant Wonde endpoints were available. It is robust to missing or incomplete data and merges all derived summaries back into the supplied schools data frame.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
summary_df <- summarise_school_data(
  schools = schools,
  WondeData = secondary_data_raw,
  year_codes_target = c("7", "Year 7"),
  subject_keywords = c("Maths", "Mathematics")
)

head(summary_df)
}
